2020-09-15T03:34:20.184889+00:00 2020-11-12T17:00:00+00:00 false tanihub TaniHub is an Indonesian Agriculture E-commerce solving problems in the supply and distribution chain of agriculture produces. Through the platform and network, TaniHub connect farmers with people in the market to enable farmers selling agriculture products with fair price and sustainable quantity.

Established in late 2015 as an on-demand application to deliver vegetables from farms to houses, in July 2016, TaniHub started to become a Business to Business suppliers for all Agriculture Commodities – Fruit, Vegetable, Poultry, Fishery, Livestock. With the support of TaniXpress, inhouse fresh-products delivery fleet, since October 2017 TaniHub expands to wider online channels, reach more SME’s, Restaurants, Resellers, and end users.

TaniHub wants to be the First Choice in delivering agriculture products from farms to market with affordable price, efficient sourcing, and reliable supply chain. The aim is to bring forward Indonesia by giving market access to as many farmers as possible. By building and growing an integrated agriculture marketplace, the technology will benefit significantly to the growth of agriculture ecosystem in Indonesia.		 25077 E-Commerce Agriculture https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/B48YRWGKBR56JZ5TM23QEQ8L94CBRP96UKQBGJEV-5b4445d0.png TaniHub true true tanihub TaniHub is an Indonesian Agriculture E-commerce solving problems in the supply and distribution chain of agriculture produces. 2020-09-29T07:55:18.448609+00:00 2021-07-07T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-estika-tata-tiara KIBIF is a leading food brand in the beef packing and processing industry. 2020-10-02T07:54:50.931895+00:00 2020-12-30T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mandiri-persero-tbk Bank Mandiri was established on 2 October 1998, as part of the bank restructuring program of the Government of Indonesia. In July 1999, four state-owned banks - Bank Bumi Daya, Bank Dagang Negara, Bank Exim and Bapindo - were amalgamated into Bank Mandiri. The history of these four banks can be traced back to over 140 years, and together they had contributed to the beginning of the Indonesian banking sector.

We are continuously seeking mutually beneficial business opportunities that create synergies, building alliances and strengthening our supporting businesses with and through our subsidiaries, notably Mandiri Sekuritas in investment banking, AXA Mandiri Financial Services in insurance, Bank Syariah Mandiri in Sharia banking, Bank Sinar Harapan Bali in micro banking, and Mandiri Tunas Finance in multi-finance. In 2011, Bank Mandiri acquired Mandiri AXA General Insurance (MAGI), a joint-venture between Bank Mandiri and AXA Societe Anonyme, to strengthen Bank Mandiri's penetration into the general insurance business. With various subsidiaries that support our businesses, we have further strengthened our position as a prominent financial holdings institution in Indonesia.

“Bank Mandiri continues to realize its commitment to human resource development through the company's work culture program, especially in this new normal era. As a result, this consistency encouraged HR Asia to win Bank Mandiri to become one of the Best Companies to Work For in 2020,”
-HR Asia 2020 (https://awards.hrasiamedia.com/winners20.php)-		 24391 Banking / Mortgage https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/33MKZQ3YE4J2D6CHPG46AY8Z45MJYFD3PUFS8DDE-5a4da1cb.png PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk. true true pt-bank-mandiri-persero-tbk Bank Mandiri was established on 2 October 1998, as part of the bank restructuring program of the Government of Indonesia. In July 1999, four state-owned banks - Bank Bumi Daya, Bank Dagang Negara, Bank Exim and Bapindo - were amalgamated into Bank Mandiri. The history of these four banks can be traced back to over 140 years, and together they had contributed to the beginning of the Indonesian banking sector.

We are continuously seeking mutually beneficial business opportunities that create synergies, building alliances and strengthening our supporting businesses with and through our subsidiaries, notably Mandiri Sekuritas in investment banking, AXA Mandiri Financial Services in insurance, Bank Syariah Mandiri in Sharia banking, Bank Sinar Harapan Bali in micro banking, and Mandiri Tunas Finance in multi-finance. In 2011, Bank Mandiri acquired Mandiri AXA General Insurance (MAGI), a joint-venture between Bank Mandiri and AXA Societe Anonyme, to strengthen Bank Mandiri's penetration into the general insurance business. With various subsidiaries that support our businesses, we have further strengthened our position as a prominent financial holdings institution in Indonesia.

2020-10-07T10:39:56.430039+00:00 2020-12-29T17:00:00+00:00 false warung-pintar Overview
Warung Pintar is a micro retail technology with a mission of transforming micro business for Indonesia’s future economy. With data-driven process and analysis, Warung Pintar tries to open windows of opportunity for financial inclusion, social security, behavior analysis, community engagement and impact monitoring.

AnWar
AnWar stands for Anak Warung, a term which refers to Warung Pintar’s employee. In Warung Pintar, we; as AnWar, are not only a group of people that looking for opportunities to grow ourselves, but also to make an impact to society. We work with our heart and decide with our head to change people’s life.

Our Values

Integrity and Data Driven
These two values are what we choose as our core competencies and how we do our planning. Data driven as our approach to make decision enables the bigger possibility to make higher impact. Integrity is the fuel and constant reminder that doing what is right always wins over doing what is convenient.

Ownership and Do It Fast
These two values describe how we implement our mission. At fast-growing company like Warung Pintar, everybody keeps growing alongside each other. We try to deliver our best performance in timely manner, never want to lose the momentum. Our ownership reminds us that doing it fast alone is not enough, being responsible of what we do is just the bare minimum, the willingness to take the extra miles to create the speed for others is what makes our contribution felt meaningful.

Open and Critical Thinking
These two values help us to review what we have been working on and how to keep on improving. We believe that critical thinking literally is critical. “What can I do to be better?” and “What are the feedbacks that I haven’t share?” are two questions to practice this value. Meanwhile, being open remind us that our failures means we get to learn faster of what works and what doesn’t.		 25643 Retail Industry https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/R5P9VEJXFG9WBGYJEE6CHXGNETR7N3BLYBPCQ9M8-5ceb632a.png Warung Pintar true true warung-pintar Overview

AnWar

In Warung Pintar, we; as AnWar, are not only a group of people that looking for opportunities to grow ourselves, but also to make an impact to society. We work with our heart and decide with our head to change people’s life.

Integrity and Data Driven
These two values are what we choose as our core competencies and how we do our planning. Data driven as our approach to make decision enables the bigger possibility to make higher impact. Integrity is the fuel and constant reminder that doing what is right always wins over doing what is convenient.

Ownership and Do It Fast
These two values describe how we implement our mission. At fast-growing company like Warung Pintar, everybody keeps growing alongside each other. We try to deliver our best performance in timely manner, never want to lose the momentum. Our ownership reminds us that doing it fast alone is not enough, being responsible of what we do is just the bare minimum, the willingness to take the extra miles to create the speed for others is what makes our contribution felt meaningful.

Open and Critical Thinking

Ever tried creating and developing your website?</p>

<p>With a team full of professionals, inspired by Customer Obsession, we are looking for the ones who can skyrocket in the global market.</p>

<p>If you can help the business stand out by providing an excellent Customer Experience, this one’s for you!</p>

<p><strong>What you will do:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Interactive learning in our Customer Success Academy with extra guidance and mentors;</li>
<li>Answering incoming conversations via live chat;</li>
<li>Helping the Customer to improve their website by assessing their needs;</li>
<li>Adjusting the product of Hostinger International and actively selling additional services;</li>
<li>Staying proud of your job for making the Client go WOW.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Here you can:</strong></p>

<ul>

2020-04-14T01:29:19.915057+00:00 2020-11-30T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mandiri-persero-tbk Bank Mandiri was established on 2 October 1998, as part of the bank restructuring program of the Government of Indonesia. In July 1999, four state-owned banks - Bank Bumi Daya, Bank Dagang Negara, Bank Exim and Bapindo - were amalgamated into Bank Mandiri. The history of these four banks can be traced back to over 140 years, and together they had contributed to the beginning of the Indonesian banking sector.

We are continuously seeking mutually beneficial business opportunities that create synergies, building alliances and strengthening our supporting businesses with and through our subsidiaries, notably Mandiri Sekuritas in investment banking, AXA Mandiri Financial Services in insurance, Bank Syariah Mandiri in Sharia banking, Bank Sinar Harapan Bali in micro banking, and Mandiri Tunas Finance in multi-finance. In 2011, Bank Mandiri acquired Mandiri AXA General Insurance (MAGI), a joint-venture between Bank Mandiri and AXA Societe Anonyme, to strengthen Bank Mandiri's penetration into the general insurance business. With various subsidiaries that support our businesses, we have further strengthened our position as a prominent financial holdings institution in Indonesia.

“Bank Mandiri continues to realize its commitment to human resource development through the company's work culture program, especially in this new normal era. As a result, this consistency encouraged HR Asia to win Bank Mandiri to become one of the Best Companies to Work For in 2020,”

2020-04-14T01:30:30.581834+00:00 2020-11-30T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mandiri-persero-tbk Bank Mandiri was established on 2 October 1998, as part of the bank restructuring program of the Government of Indonesia. In July 1999, four state-owned banks - Bank Bumi Daya, Bank Dagang Negara, Bank Exim and Bapindo - were amalgamated into Bank Mandiri. The history of these four banks can be traced back to over 140 years, and together they had contributed to the beginning of the Indonesian banking sector.

We are continuously seeking mutually beneficial business opportunities that create synergies, building alliances and strengthening our supporting businesses with and through our subsidiaries, notably Mandiri Sekuritas in investment banking, AXA Mandiri Financial Services in insurance, Bank Syariah Mandiri in Sharia banking, Bank Sinar Harapan Bali in micro banking, and Mandiri Tunas Finance in multi-finance. In 2011, Bank Mandiri acquired Mandiri AXA General Insurance (MAGI), a joint-venture between Bank Mandiri and AXA Societe Anonyme, to strengthen Bank Mandiri's penetration into the general insurance business. With various subsidiaries that support our businesses, we have further strengthened our position as a prominent financial holdings institution in Indonesia.

“Bank Mandiri continues to realize its commitment to human resource development through the company's work culture program, especially in this new normal era. As a result, this consistency encouraged HR Asia to win Bank Mandiri to become one of the Best Companies to Work For in 2020,”

<li>Familiar with System Development Life Cycle (SDLC).</li>
<li>Experiences in agile SDLC will be valuable.</li>
<li>Strong on logical Analysis.</li>
<li>A good self-learner and Teamwork player.</li>
<li>Have a good ability to develop technical documentation.</li>
<li>Very good communication and interpersonal skill.</li>
<li>Able to speak in English and Bahasa (actively).</li>
<li>Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.</li>
<li>Possess software as well as database programming skill</li>
<li>Have at least 2 to 3 years of experience in Object Oriented Programming (OOP)</li>
<li>Have at least 2 to 3 years of experience in RPG/400, CL/400, OS/400, SQL/400</li>
<li>Have at least 1 year experience in core banking projects using RPG/400</li>

</ul>		 7.7405857740585775 true graphic-designer-kompas-com Full time public 200 https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/images/XDYNNV9UZCGTPNK8CPAUMTQQ42MLH35Q6G4N7Q23-5bda8463.jpg
2020-05-04T02:59:40.305710+00:00 2021-05-04T02:59:40.305710+00:00 false pt-bank-mega-tbk "Berawal dari sebuah usaha milik keluarga bernama PT. Bank Karman yang didirikan pada tahun 1969 dan berkedudukan di Surabaya, selanjutnya pada tahun 1992 berubah nama menjadi PT. Mega Bank dan melakukan relokasi Kantor Pusat ke Jakarta.

Seiring dengan perkembangannya PT. Mega Bank pada tahun 1996 diambil alih oleh PARA GROUP (PT. Para Global Investindo dan PT. Para Rekan Investama)sebuah holding company milik pengusaha nasional - Chairul Tanjung. Selanjutnya PARA GROUP berubah nama menjadi CT Corpora.

Untuk lebih meningkatkan citra PT. Mega Bank, pada bulan Juni 1997 melakukan perubahan logo Bank Mega berupa tulisan huruf M warna biru kuning dengan tujuan bahwa sebagai lembaga keuangan kepercayaan masyarakat, akan lebih mudah dikenal melalui logo perusahaan yang baru tersebut. Dan pada tahun 2000 dilakukan perubahan nama dari PT. Mega Bank menjadi PT. Bank Mega.

Dalam rangka memperkuat struktur permodalan maka pada tahun yang sama PT. Bank Mega melaksanakan Initial Public Offering dan listed di BEJ maupun BES. Dengan demikian sebagian saham PT. Bank Mega dimiliki oleh publik dan berubah namanya menjadi PT. Bank Mega Tbk.

Pada saat krisis ekonomi, Bank Mega mencuat sebagai salah satu bank yang tidak terpengaruh oleh krisis dan tumbuh terus tanpa bantuan pemerintah bersama-sama dengan Citibank, Deutche Bank dan HSBC.

PT. Bank Mega Tbk. dengan semboyan ""Mega Tujuan Anda"" tumbuh dengan pesat dan terkendali serta menjadi lembaga keuangan ternama yang mampu disejajarkan dengan bank-bank terkemuka di Asia Pasifik dan telah mendapatkan berbagai penghargaan dan prestasi baik di tingkat nasional, regional maupun internasional. Dalam upaya mewujudkan kinerja sesuai dengan nama yang disandangnya, PT. Bank Mega Tbk. berpegang pada azas profesionalisme, keterbukaan dan kehati-hatian dengan struktur permodalan yang kuat serta produk dan fasilitas perbankan terkini.

Setiap tahapan bisnis yang dilalui Bank Mega terkadang mendapat tantangan. Namun dengan berbekal keyakinan dan semangat untuk terus menjadi yang terbaik, sehingga mampu memberikan yang terbaik pula bagi bangsa, seluruh elemen Bank sepakat untuk lebih mempertegas cita-cita tersebut. Transformasi logo baru Bank Mega dalam wujud yang baru menjadi cerminan semangat seluruh elemen Bank Mega dalam mewujudkan cita-cita Indonesia.

Transformasi logo baru Bank Mega dilakukan tahun 2013, merupakan refleksi yang mendalam atas harapan Bank Mega untuk berkiprah membangun Indonesia menjadi bangsa yang memiliki keunggulan dan pantang menyerah sehingga selalu mampu mewujudkan kesejahteraan dan kehidupan yang terus lebih baik.

Penegasan simbol ""M"" yang selama ini sudah banyak dikenal, menjadi representasi dari aspirasi, optimisme, peluang dan cita-cita masyarakat Indonesia serta keinginan untuk membangun masa depan keluarga dan bangsa yang lebih baik dan lebih sejahtera.
Rangkaian warna-warna hangat melambangkan energi dan semangat Bank Mega, pemikiran yang baru dan solusi finansial menyeluruh bagi nasabah serta insan Bank Mega. Guna lebih mempertegas kami menyematkan warna kuning yang menggambarkan kecerdasan dan harapan, dipadu dengan warna abu-abu yang menyimbolkan proses dan sistem yang canggih. Warna oranye menggambarkan optimisme dan energisitas yang menunjukkan bahwa Bank Mega selalu melihat dan melakukan sesuatu secara positif dan dengan demikian selalu berjuang mendapatkan hasil yang positif pula.
Di Bank Mega anda dapat melakukan transaksi perbankan dengan mudah, cepat dan nyaman berkat sistem komputerisasi dan teknologi yang canggih, sehingga jaringan online antar cabang terintegrasi dengan baik.

Bagi nasabah utama, kami menyediakan Priority Banking, Mega First dengan priority facilities yang diutamakan untuk kepuasan dengan jaminan keamanan yang tinggi.
Banking Hall - Kantor Cabang Utama, Jakarta Tendean terletak di lantai 1 Menara Bank Mega. Tersedia pula Safe Deposit Box yang memiliki kapasitas memadai dengan jaminan sistem keamanan yang canggih. Kami sediakan ATM yang beroperasi setiap hari selama 24 jam untuk kemudahan transaksi perbankan dan juga penarikan tunai.

Untuk memperluas layanan nasabah, Bank Mega juga memiliki Treasury Room di lantai 16. Dalam mengembangkan Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM) disediakan Training Center di lantai 12 untuk berbagai pelatihan dengan fasilitas yang lengkap dan modern.

Keberhasilan dan kemajuan sebuah perusahaan tidak terlepas dari budaya yang dimiliki perusahaan tersebut. Budaya yang dikembangkan di dalam tubuh Bank Mega didasari oleh nilai-nilai berikut :
• Dynamic
• Entrepreneurship
• Trust
• Ethics
• Commitment
• Synergy		 25538 Banking / Mortgage https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/HMCDK784Z8AUE5HA5XC6R5BMX592DLXNZ5T3YZVM-5cc6a02a.png PT. <b>What’s it like working at IDN Media?</b>

<b>Life at IDN Media</b>

The secret ingredient that makes IDN Media a great place to work is the people. You will meet so many Timmy in IDN Media who are equally obsessed and passionate with you in what they are doing. You will be surrounded by extremely smart, friendly, and awesome people who will help you whenever you need them and push you to the next level.

In IDN Media, we do cool things that contribute to the future of Indonesia. We want to bring change and to shape the future of media industry.

- Flexible Working Style
- “Wear Anything” dress code policy
- Free lunch and drinks (booze included)

- Free Gym at the HQ office
- Performance-driven culture
- Super fun teammates
- Open culture

Our perks and benefits are specially designed to keep you happy and healthy (physically, emotionally, and financially). We want to take care of you and make sure that you can focus and enjoy what you are doing here. <p>We're looking for those who:</p>

<ul>
<li>Must have min 2 years of working experience in the Digital Media or Advertising Company as Digital Account Executive, Account Executive, Sales Executive, or other relevant position.</li>
<li>Must have experience in direct selling/pitching, not only account handling</li>
<li>Passionate about digital, event management, and media advertising</li>
<li>Have a list of direct clients would be preferred (in Beauty Brands, FMCG brands, Government, Automotive brands, etc.)</li>

2020-10-26T05:43:16.942177+00:00 2020-12-24T17:00:00+00:00 false bfifinance Who is PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk?

PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1982. It is one of the oldest and the most diversified multi finance companies in Indonesia as well as the first multi finance company to be listed on Indonesia Stock Exchange with ticker code BFIN. Currently BFI Finance had over 300 branch and 9000 employee across the nation.

In 2017, PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk build a subsidiary called PT Finansial Integrasi Teknologi (FIT). We believe that technology can facilitate more financial access to Indonesian people. FIT has launched its platform "Pinjam Modal" in October 2018.		 25428 Financial Services https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/6YN9FA59BBSXA9V2N34EHQTA38E93JZ8FJ985HM5-5c87e275.png PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk true true bfifinance Who is PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk?

2020-09-07T09:19:32.936114+00:00 2020-12-30T17:00:00+00:00 false permata-bank PermataBank was formed by a merger of five banks under the oversight of IBRA (Indonesian Banking Restructuring Agency), i.e. PT Bank Bali Tbk, PT Bank Universal Tbk, PT Bank Prima Express, PT Bank Artamedia, and PT Bank Patriot in 2002. In 2004, Standard Chartered Bank and PT Astra International Tbk took over PermataBank and started a major transformation of the organization. Subsequently, as a manifestation of their commitment to PermataBank, these major shareholders increased their joint ownership to 89.12% since 2006 until now.

The unique combination of our strategic shareholders has become one of our core strengths. PT Astra International Tbk is one of the biggest Indonesian conglomeration company in Indonesia with extensive experience in the domestic market, while Standard Chartered Bank is a well-respected international bank with market leading expertise and global experience.

PermataBank today has grown into a major private bank offering innovative products and services that can provide comprehensive financial services in a simple, fast, and reliable manner. As a pioneer in mobile banking and mobile cash technology in the Indonesian market, in 2017, PermataBank took a lead in innovation through the launch of the first E-Bond product on the market and was the first bank to introduce TouchID & FaceID in PermataMobile Banking.

Serving more than 2 million customers in 62 cities in Indonesia, per December 2018 the Bank has 323 branches (sharia & conventional branches), 16 Mobile Branches, 23 one-stop Sharia service, two Payment Point, 1.018 ATM with additional access at more than 100.000 ATMs (VisaPlus, Visa Electron, MasterCard, Alto, ATM Bersama and ATM Prima) and millions of ATMs around the world that are connected to the network Visa, Mastercard, Cirrus.

The recognition of recent achievements of PermataBank are, among others, CSR Recognition in Education from Sindo Media (Jan 2018); "Exceptional Grade" from the Carre Center for Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty (Carre - CCSL) Award 2018 for, among others, Regular Banking, Credit Card Regular, Platinum Card, Priority Banking dan Sharia Banking (Apr 2018); 13 awards from Banking Service Excellence Award 2018 (Jun 2018), for, among others, Rank #3 Best Overall Performance and rank #1 Best Opening Account Website Application (General category); Rank #1 Best Overall Performance and Best Customer Service (Bank syariah category) and 1 Golden Trophy for the Best Sharia Banking for maintaining the 'Best Overall Performance' title since 2011; "The Best Frictionless Internet Banking Initiative, Application or Programme" dari The Asian Banker - Indonesia Country Award 2018 (Ags 2018); 5 Gold Awards for category Best Event Press / Media, Best Event Consumer, Best Event Digital Integration, Best Event Ambience, Best Event Product Launch / Relaunch and 1 Silver Award for category Best Event Multi Channel from The Marketing Events Award for PermataMe #CountMEin campaign (Sept 2018).

PT. Bank Permata Tbk obtained the license as the commercial bank under The Decree of Minister of Finance Number 1937/U.M.II dated 19 February 1957.		 25396 Banking / Mortgage https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/WKRKW75R7Z28ARWXUU3AGQFTX49DCMDNJ7BA45WJ-5c63e5a5.png Permata Bank true true permata-bank PermataBank was formed by a merger of five banks under the oversight of IBRA (Indonesian Banking Restructuring Agency), i.e. PT Bank Bali Tbk, PT Bank Universal Tbk, PT Bank Prima Express, PT Bank Artamedia, and PT Bank Patriot in 2002. 2020-11-06T15:29:46.687795+00:00 2020-12-02T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mega-tbk "Berawal dari sebuah usaha milik keluarga bernama PT. Bank Karman yang didirikan pada tahun 1969 dan berkedudukan di Surabaya, selanjutnya pada tahun 1992 berubah nama menjadi PT. Mega Bank dan melakukan relokasi Kantor Pusat ke Jakarta.

Seiring dengan perkembangannya PT. Mega Bank pada tahun 1996 diambil alih oleh PARA GROUP (PT. Para Global Investindo dan PT. Para Rekan Investama)sebuah holding company milik pengusaha nasional - Chairul Tanjung. Selanjutnya PARA GROUP berubah nama menjadi CT Corpora.

Untuk lebih meningkatkan citra PT. Mega Bank, pada bulan Juni 1997 melakukan perubahan logo Bank Mega berupa tulisan huruf M warna biru kuning dengan tujuan bahwa sebagai lembaga keuangan kepercayaan masyarakat, akan lebih mudah dikenal melalui logo perusahaan yang baru tersebut. Dan pada tahun 2000 dilakukan perubahan nama dari PT. Mega Bank menjadi PT. Bank Mega.

Dalam rangka memperkuat struktur permodalan maka pada tahun yang sama PT. Bank Mega melaksanakan Initial Public Offering dan listed di BEJ maupun BES. Dengan demikian sebagian saham PT. Bank Mega dimiliki oleh publik dan berubah namanya menjadi PT. Bank Mega Tbk.

Pada saat krisis ekonomi, Bank Mega mencuat sebagai salah satu bank yang tidak terpengaruh oleh krisis dan tumbuh terus tanpa bantuan pemerintah bersama-sama dengan Citibank, Deutche Bank dan HSBC.

PT. Bank Mega Tbk. dengan semboyan ""Mega Tujuan Anda"" tumbuh dengan pesat dan terkendali serta menjadi lembaga keuangan ternama yang mampu disejajarkan dengan bank-bank terkemuka di Asia Pasifik dan telah mendapatkan berbagai penghargaan dan prestasi baik di tingkat nasional, regional maupun internasional. Dalam upaya mewujudkan kinerja sesuai dengan nama yang disandangnya, PT. Bank Mega Tbk. berpegang pada azas profesionalisme, keterbukaan dan kehati-hatian dengan struktur permodalan yang kuat serta produk dan fasilitas perbankan terkini.

Setiap tahapan bisnis yang dilalui Bank Mega terkadang mendapat tantangan. Namun dengan berbekal keyakinan dan semangat untuk terus menjadi yang terbaik, sehingga mampu memberikan yang terbaik pula bagi bangsa, seluruh elemen Bank sepakat untuk lebih mempertegas cita-cita tersebut. Transformasi logo baru Bank Mega dalam wujud yang baru menjadi cerminan semangat seluruh elemen Bank Mega dalam mewujudkan cita-cita Indonesia.

Transformasi logo baru Bank Mega dilakukan tahun 2013, merupakan refleksi yang mendalam atas harapan Bank Mega untuk berkiprah membangun Indonesia menjadi bangsa yang memiliki keunggulan dan pantang menyerah sehingga selalu mampu mewujudkan kesejahteraan dan kehidupan yang terus lebih baik.

Penegasan simbol ""M"" yang selama ini sudah banyak dikenal, menjadi representasi dari aspirasi, optimisme, peluang dan cita-cita masyarakat Indonesia serta keinginan untuk membangun masa depan keluarga dan bangsa yang lebih baik dan lebih sejahtera.
Rangkaian warna-warna hangat melambangkan energi dan semangat Bank Mega, pemikiran yang baru dan solusi finansial menyeluruh bagi nasabah serta insan Bank Mega. Guna lebih mempertegas kami menyematkan warna kuning yang menggambarkan kecerdasan dan harapan, dipadu dengan warna abu-abu yang menyimbolkan proses dan sistem yang canggih. Warna oranye menggambarkan optimisme dan energisitas yang menunjukkan bahwa Bank Mega selalu melihat dan melakukan sesuatu secara positif dan dengan demikian selalu berjuang mendapatkan hasil yang positif pula.
Di Bank Mega anda dapat melakukan transaksi perbankan dengan mudah, cepat dan nyaman berkat sistem komputerisasi dan teknologi yang canggih, sehingga jaringan online antar cabang terintegrasi dengan baik.

Bagi nasabah utama, kami menyediakan Priority Banking, Mega First dengan priority facilities yang diutamakan untuk kepuasan dengan jaminan keamanan yang tinggi.
Banking Hall - Kantor Cabang Utama, Jakarta Tendean terletak di lantai 1 Menara Bank Mega. Tersedia pula Safe Deposit Box yang memiliki kapasitas memadai dengan jaminan sistem keamanan yang canggih. Kami sediakan ATM yang beroperasi setiap hari selama 24 jam untuk kemudahan transaksi perbankan dan juga penarikan tunai.

Untuk memperluas layanan nasabah, Bank Mega juga memiliki Treasury Room di lantai 16. Dalam mengembangkan Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM) disediakan Training Center di lantai 12 untuk berbagai pelatihan dengan fasilitas yang lengkap dan modern.

Keberhasilan dan kemajuan sebuah perusahaan tidak terlepas dari budaya yang dimiliki perusahaan tersebut. Budaya yang dikembangkan di dalam tubuh Bank Mega didasari oleh nilai-nilai berikut :
• Dynamic
• Entrepreneurship
• Trust
• Ethics
• Commitment
• Synergy		 25538 Banking / Mortgage https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/HMCDK784Z8AUE5HA5XC6R5BMX592DLXNZ5T3YZVM-5cc6a02a.png PT. Bank Mega Tbk. true true transdigital CT Corp Digital is a digital company whose mission is to digitize the CT Corpora consumer ecosystem through the integration of offline businesses with online digital technology. Our team focuses on developing new business lines and digitally transform the Group into the most consumer-centric business in Southeast Asia. Our team has worked for the largest brands, spanning technology (Google, Amazon); consulting (BCG, Accenture, DunnHumby) and retail (Tesco, M&S, L'Oreal, Burberry). There are immediate opportunities available for those with exceptional drive who are motivated to develop and learn whilst impacting 100+ million consumers across Indonesia. Information Technology / IT false https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.ph/logos/NC5GZ4WD6S4RKH8S8633YGCS3P2GJ2MRYAL9ERJ3-5d3687ca.png https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.ph/logos/NE9QJLSN7TBYRD8RNEHUYD8XAGVK5KR2A3V294AR-5d3687cc.jpg https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.ph/logos/8S2UJ9BYKDR6KUHZKQNE5CVLG2PZQZ5LBN6MMCRE-5d3687cb.png https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.ph/logos/EAAFET24HZG95UUL8KWAUYYMH4XVFWMPREFKGCPD-5d3687ca.png CT Corp Digital http://ctcorpora.com/ CT Corp Digital 2020-11-03T04:10:24.268075+00:00 <p>We are looking to hire a highly driven Product Manager to assist the company to improve business efficiency. The Product Manager is responsible for the product planning and execution throughout the Product Lifecycle, including: gathering and prioritizing product and customer requirements, defining the product vision, and working closely with engineering, sales, marketing and support to ensure revenue and customer satisfaction goals are met. The Product Manager’s job also includes ensuring that the product supports the company’s overall strategy and goals.</p>

<p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Define the product strategy and roadmap</li>
<li>Deliver MRDs and PRDs with prioritized features and corresponding justification</li>
<li>Work with external third parties to assess partnerships and licensing opportunities</li>
<li>Run beta and pilot programs with early-stage products and samples</li>
<li>Be an expert with respect to the competition</li>
<li>Act as a leader within the company</li>
<li>Develop personas and create a profiles particular users based on characteristics</li>
<li>Apply User Flow and map out pathways an individual will take in a website or platform</li>
<li>Successfully use and apply wireframes in order to interface concepts</li>
<li>Create prototypes to show and demonstrate interactions</li>
<li>Regularly participate in design reviews</li>
<li>Stay updated in recent design trends and demonstrate passion for learning</li>
</ul>

2020-04-14T01:26:25.575331+00:00 2020-11-22T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mandiri-persero-tbk Bank Mandiri was established on 2 October 1998, as part of the bank restructuring program of the Government of Indonesia. In July 1999, four state-owned banks - Bank Bumi Daya, Bank Dagang Negara, Bank Exim and Bapindo - were amalgamated into Bank Mandiri. The history of these four banks can be traced back to over 140 years, and together they had contributed to the beginning of the Indonesian banking sector.

We are continuously seeking mutually beneficial business opportunities that create synergies, building alliances and strengthening our supporting businesses with and through our subsidiaries, notably Mandiri Sekuritas in investment banking, AXA Mandiri Financial Services in insurance, Bank Syariah Mandiri in Sharia banking, Bank Sinar Harapan Bali in micro banking, and Mandiri Tunas Finance in multi-finance. In 2011, Bank Mandiri acquired Mandiri AXA General Insurance (MAGI), a joint-venture between Bank Mandiri and AXA Societe Anonyme, to strengthen Bank Mandiri's penetration into the general insurance business. With various subsidiaries that support our businesses, we have further strengthened our position as a prominent financial holdings institution in Indonesia.

2020-10-15T03:47:36.521778+00:00 2020-11-14T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mega-tbk "Berawal dari sebuah usaha milik keluarga bernama PT. Bank Karman yang didirikan pada tahun 1969 dan berkedudukan di Surabaya, selanjutnya pada tahun 1992 berubah nama menjadi PT. Mega Bank dan melakukan relokasi Kantor Pusat ke Jakarta.

Seiring dengan perkembangannya PT. Mega Bank pada tahun 1996 diambil alih oleh PARA GROUP (PT. Para Global Investindo dan PT. Para Rekan Investama)sebuah holding company milik pengusaha nasional - Chairul Tanjung. Selanjutnya PARA GROUP berubah nama menjadi CT Corpora.

Untuk lebih meningkatkan citra PT. Mega Bank, pada bulan Juni 1997 melakukan perubahan logo Bank Mega berupa tulisan huruf M warna biru kuning dengan tujuan bahwa sebagai lembaga keuangan kepercayaan masyarakat, akan lebih mudah dikenal melalui logo perusahaan yang baru tersebut. Dan pada tahun 2000 dilakukan perubahan nama dari PT. Mega Bank menjadi PT. Bank Mega.

Dalam rangka memperkuat struktur permodalan maka pada tahun yang sama PT. Bank Mega melaksanakan Initial Public Offering dan listed di BEJ maupun BES. Dengan demikian sebagian saham PT. Bank Mega dimiliki oleh publik dan berubah namanya menjadi PT. Bank Mega Tbk.

Pada saat krisis ekonomi, Bank Mega mencuat sebagai salah satu bank yang tidak terpengaruh oleh krisis dan tumbuh terus tanpa bantuan pemerintah bersama-sama dengan Citibank, Deutche Bank dan HSBC.

PT. Bank Mega Tbk. dengan semboyan ""Mega Tujuan Anda"" tumbuh dengan pesat dan terkendali serta menjadi lembaga keuangan ternama yang mampu disejajarkan dengan bank-bank terkemuka di Asia Pasifik dan telah mendapatkan berbagai penghargaan dan prestasi baik di tingkat nasional, regional maupun internasional. Dalam upaya mewujudkan kinerja sesuai dengan nama yang disandangnya, PT. Bank Mega Tbk. berpegang pada azas profesionalisme, keterbukaan dan kehati-hatian dengan struktur permodalan yang kuat serta produk dan fasilitas perbankan terkini.

Setiap tahapan bisnis yang dilalui Bank Mega terkadang mendapat tantangan. Namun dengan berbekal keyakinan dan semangat untuk terus menjadi yang terbaik, sehingga mampu memberikan yang terbaik pula bagi bangsa, seluruh elemen Bank sepakat untuk lebih mempertegas cita-cita tersebut. Transformasi logo baru Bank Mega dalam wujud yang baru menjadi cerminan semangat seluruh elemen Bank Mega dalam mewujudkan cita-cita Indonesia.

Transformasi logo baru Bank Mega dilakukan tahun 2013, merupakan refleksi yang mendalam atas harapan Bank Mega untuk berkiprah membangun Indonesia menjadi bangsa yang memiliki keunggulan dan pantang menyerah sehingga selalu mampu mewujudkan kesejahteraan dan kehidupan yang terus lebih baik.

Penegasan simbol ""M"" yang selama ini sudah banyak dikenal, menjadi representasi dari aspirasi, optimisme, peluang dan cita-cita masyarakat Indonesia serta keinginan untuk membangun masa depan keluarga dan bangsa yang lebih baik dan lebih sejahtera.
Rangkaian warna-warna hangat melambangkan energi dan semangat Bank Mega, pemikiran yang baru dan solusi finansial menyeluruh bagi nasabah serta insan Bank Mega. Guna lebih mempertegas kami menyematkan warna kuning yang menggambarkan kecerdasan dan harapan, dipadu dengan warna abu-abu yang menyimbolkan proses dan sistem yang canggih. Warna oranye menggambarkan optimisme dan energisitas yang menunjukkan bahwa Bank Mega selalu melihat dan melakukan sesuatu secara positif dan dengan demikian selalu berjuang mendapatkan hasil yang positif pula.
Di Bank Mega anda dapat melakukan transaksi perbankan dengan mudah, cepat dan nyaman berkat sistem komputerisasi dan teknologi yang canggih, sehingga jaringan online antar cabang terintegrasi dengan baik.

Bagi nasabah utama, kami menyediakan Priority Banking, Mega First dengan priority facilities yang diutamakan untuk kepuasan dengan jaminan keamanan yang tinggi.
Banking Hall - Kantor Cabang Utama, Jakarta Tendean terletak di lantai 1 Menara Bank Mega. Tersedia pula Safe Deposit Box yang memiliki kapasitas memadai dengan jaminan sistem keamanan yang canggih. Kami sediakan ATM yang beroperasi setiap hari selama 24 jam untuk kemudahan transaksi perbankan dan juga penarikan tunai.

Untuk memperluas layanan nasabah, Bank Mega juga memiliki Treasury Room di lantai 16. Dalam mengembangkan Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM) disediakan Training Center di lantai 12 untuk berbagai pelatihan dengan fasilitas yang lengkap dan modern.

Keberhasilan dan kemajuan sebuah perusahaan tidak terlepas dari budaya yang dimiliki perusahaan tersebut. Budaya yang dikembangkan di dalam tubuh Bank Mega didasari oleh nilai-nilai berikut :

2020-04-14T01:25:53.056133+00:00 2020-11-30T17:00:00+00:00 false pt-bank-mandiri-persero-tbk Bank Mandiri was established on 2 October 1998, as part of the bank restructuring program of the Government of Indonesia. In July 1999, four state-owned banks - Bank Bumi Daya, Bank Dagang Negara, Bank Exim and Bapindo - were amalgamated into Bank Mandiri. The history of these four banks can be traced back to over 140 years, and together they had contributed to the beginning of the Indonesian banking sector.

We are continuously seeking mutually beneficial business opportunities that create synergies, building alliances and strengthening our supporting businesses with and through our subsidiaries, notably Mandiri Sekuritas in investment banking, AXA Mandiri Financial Services in insurance, Bank Syariah Mandiri in Sharia banking, Bank Sinar Harapan Bali in micro banking, and Mandiri Tunas Finance in multi-finance. In 2011, Bank Mandiri acquired Mandiri AXA General Insurance (MAGI), a joint-venture between Bank Mandiri and AXA Societe Anonyme, to strengthen Bank Mandiri's penetration into the general insurance business. With various subsidiaries that support our businesses, we have further strengthened our position as a prominent financial holdings institution in Indonesia.

“Bank Mandiri continues to realize its commitment to human resource development through the company's work culture program, especially in this new normal era. As a result, this consistency encouraged HR Asia to win Bank Mandiri to become one of the Best Companies to Work For in 2020,”

<p>About The Company Studio Darshana (DDS) is a digital creative start-up company based in Jakarta that works on a platform called SelfMade - a digital marketing solution available in a mobile application and web-based application. SelfMade’s primary objective is to drive positive growth and ROI for its customers through marketing solutions. SelfMade's customers are small-to-medium enterprises around the USA, largely based in New York City.</p>

<p><strong>About the Job</strong></p>

<p>As a part of this company, you will apply your skills and experience to help drive business through engineering principles. In addition to delivering innovative solutions for your clients, you will work with an International team based on NYC that is using the latest emerging technologies. You will receive competitive rewards, world-class learning resources, and interesting benefits.</p>
